DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety tolerability multiple dos Sulforadex® healthy male volunteer 7 day qd bid dose
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled design multiple ascending dos Sulforadex® administer qd [ daily ] bid [ twice daily ] ) healthy male subject 18 45 year age .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject healthy male race age 18 45 year , inclusive , screen . 2 . Subject BMI 18 25 kg/m2 inclusive screening . 3 . Subjects must agree use acceptable method contraception , 4 . Subjects donate sperm time first administration treatment study medication 3 month follow administration last treatment dose study medication . 5 . Subjects must capable understand comply requirement protocol must sign ICF prior undergo studyrelated procedure . 1 . All subject must refrain eat brassica vegetable use brassica contain supplement least 7 day prior drug administration . Brassica vegetables include cabbage , cauliflower , horseradish , landcress , Ethiopian mustard , kale , collard green , Chinese broccoli , brussels sprout , Kohlrabi broccoli , broccoli flower , broccoli romanesco , wild broccoli , bok choy , Komatsuna , mizuna , rapini , flower cabbage , Chinese cabbage , Napa cabbage , turnip root , rutabaga , canola/rape seed , Siberian kale , wrap heart mustard cabbage , mustard seed ( brown , black , white ) , tatsoi , rocket ( arugula ) , garden cress , water cress , radish , daikon wasabi . 2 . Subject clinically significant disease condition disease might affect drug absorption , distribution excretion . 3 . Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory , vital sign safety finding determine medical history , physical examination evaluation conduct screen admission . 4 . ECG abnormalities standard 12lead ECG ( screen ) opinion Investigator clinically relevant interfere ECG analysis . 5 . History current evidence clinically relevant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , haematological , endocrinological , metabolic , neurological , psychiatric , disease . 6 . Positive result serology test Hepatitis B Surface Antigen ( HbsAg ) , anti Hepatitis core antibody ( anti HBc Ig G [ anti HBc IgM IgG positive ] , Hepatitis C virus antibody ( anti HCV ) , human immunodeficiency virus HIV 1 2 antibody ( anti HIV 1/2 ) . 7 . Confirmed positive result urine drug screen ( amphetamine , benzodiazepine , cocaine , cannabinoids , opiate , barbiturate , tricyclic antidepressant methadone ) alcohol breath test screen admission ( Day 1 ) . 8 . History clinical evidence alcohol drug abuse . 9 . Mentally handicap .
